testcase.classname: As an administrator (admin) I want to create a parcel record via API connection.
testcase.name: admin Send a POST request to the api/parcel/add endpoint with valid authorization and missing data (merchant_id), verify the response status code is 400, and the message is
testcase.system-out: * The api user sets "api/parcel/add" path parameters........................passed * The api user prepares a POST request containing 6, 1, 1, "John Due", "145879632147" and "318 WARREN ST, Brooklyn, NY 11206" information to send to the api hubadd endpoint..passed * The api user sends a "POST" request and saves the returned response.......passed * The api user verifies that the status code is 400.........................passed * The api user verifies that the "message" information in the response body is "No merchant id."..passed
